successes.title: Astro: Time-Lapse + Motion Control
successes.description: The most intuitive, compact and simple intervalometer + motion control for timelapse photography

Pledges.description: Thank you! You will get access to backer-exclusive updates and your name will be posted on our website as a contributor

We will send you a short guide book with everything we learned about time lapse photography while creating this project. It includes tips, settings and checklists for you to avoid all the mistakes we made! Free Shipping to USA. (Add $5 for International Shipping)
Reserve your spot on the second production run of Astro at the Kickstarter price! Your pledge will be an advanced payment for when you place the order in early 2013
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! Be the first to get one Silver Astro! This is a limited offer. Free Shipping to USA. (Add $15 for International Shipping)
One Silver Astro! Free Shipping to USA (Add $15 for International Shipping)

One Black Special Edition Astro! It will come in a special package and will include a booklet with pictures and insights of the design and manufacturing process. Free Shipping to USA (Add $15 for International Shipping)
TWO Astros! One Black Special Edition and one Silver. Free Shipping to USA (Add $15 for International Shipping)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: PAN & TILT PACK!  TWO Astros in your choice of Silver or Black, 2 L brackets for pan & tilt motion, 2 camera cables, 1 smartphone cable,  1 short guide book for timelapse photography and 1 special booklet with insights of the design and manufacturing process.

PAN & TILT PACK!  TWO Astros in your choice of Silver or Black, 2 L brackets for pan & tilt motion, 2 camera cables, 1 smartphone cable,  1 short guide book for timelapse photography and 1 special booklet with insights of the design and manufacturing process. (Add $15 for International Shipping)
RETAIL PACK: Five Astros! One Black Special Edition and four Silver. Free Shipping to USA (Add $30 for International Shipping)
